title: Squamish River - Upper
whats_it_like: Amazing canyons - unless you're brave, it's an early or late season scenery trip.

difficulty.text: III-IV boating through some significant canyons.

scouting_portaging: Moderate. Impossible once in the canyons.
when_to_go: Very early or late season at low water.  Anything but low flows haven't been tested.
